newsitem.title: USA: Access Health to buy Informed Access.
newsitem.headline: Access Health to buy Informed Access.

text.p: Access Health Inc said Tuesday it agreed to acquire Informed Access Systems in a stock transaction.

Under the terms of a definitive agreement, Access Health will issue 5.375 million of its shares to Informed Access Systems in exchange for all of that company's 6.6 million fully diluted outstanding shares.
After the merger, Access Health will have 19.2 million common shares outstanding, with current shareholders of Informed Access Systems owning about 28 percent of the stock.
Informed Access is a Colorado-based health information services company backed by venture capital.
